::KitKat::

She ran along the hilside.  She was frantic.  She held her gun and 
shot around her wildly.  "LEAVE ME ALONE! GO AWAY!" She was shaking 
as she ran.  




--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, wilddance_mare@h... wrote:
> Rattrap:
> 
> 
> 
> Rattrap walked down and finally found the owner of the voice. He 
> watched as she fired randomly. It seemed to him that someone was 
> after her. 
> 
> She ran off, a few yards away from him. He kept his body low and 
> scampered after her.
